item.title: Go dep in Docker
item.description: Go’s dependency handling has been an area which has been needing unification, over the years. Multiple package managers have been created. The Go community has been working on creating a dependency manager recently, which they plan on getting added to the official toolchain. I’ve decided to jump on the bandwagon and start using this tool. Here’s how I’ve been using it in docker.
